header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends

body.u: erm I've got my welcome back meeting on the twenty-sixth of September I don't know where I want to go because like they said it was vital last year and it was fucking shit there was no point even going
yeah
like it's saying this meeting will provide you with important information about the forthcoming academic year therefore it is vital that you attend
although second year I guess it might be a little bit more important
yeah
explaining things well we we're going to be there together we can always just travel up together
that's the day before the engagement party yeah we can I'll get to take us it's between twelve thirty to one thirty but
how how did you find out about that?
I got an email like you want to check your emails cos
earlier I didn't have anything but I'll keep checking cos if mine's on the same day then we can just commute together
yeah well will take us anyway so
if it's not on the same day it'll be slightly more difficult

mine's school of English so I I reckon yours will be the same day because that's the day that everyone goes back I think it's the the last day before the new term but will be travelling to work every day that week so
okay
like he won't mind taking you you might just have to hang around at uni for a few hours extra than if you would have if you got a train
yeah obviously if he was if he was taking me then that's not a problem can't wait to just move in though get all my stuff decorate my bedroom
when you get when you and come up to do you want to go shopping at the I can get 's mum to take us
yeah that would be really nice actually
erm
but erm
and cos they've got loads of cheap stuff that we can buy to decorate
erm I would actually if you wouldn't mind I'd say wait until we've moved stuff in
yeah
to see what we actually need and like what space there's going to be cos there's five of us and we've all got extra stuff
no I mean for our rooms like I want to get some fairy lights I want to get like some nice bedding and stuff like that

oh right okay yeah no we can do that yeah definitely I'm going to get another set of bedding as well because two it was like it was alright but as soon as I'd take one off I'd have to wash it so it would be okay next one
yeah yeah but at least this year we get free washing
yeah
like cos that were really annoying last year having to go all the way downstairs and
can't wait to get my special pillow back I didn't really think it through because I bought it with me when we were driving
yeah
from here to England cos it's like my favourite pillow it's so squishy and lovely
yeah

erm and I didn't really think it through that I wouldn't have it back in so like Christmas it was really hard I had to f I'd like literally tried every single pillow in the house now I found one that's okay
yeah that you can sleep on?
yeah

well I've got special pillows I think that's why I've got a bad neck because the pillows that I've got are specifically designed for the way that I sleep and I think that's why I've got a bad neck cos I'm sssleeping on
sleeping on random pillows
yeah a square one that ain't no offence to the but it's not very good to be quite honest

no I it took me ages to get rid eh used to the square ones but I've gotten used to them now so like I know that I'll sleep on it for a few nights on one side and then flip it over cos all the squishiness goes up to one side so I just keep flipping it
what's your favourite part about moving in next year like what are you looking forward to the most
erm
everything's alright between me and now by the way
oh yeah yeah I've noticed it's fine
yeah like we talk to each other a lot
I think I'm really looking forward to having like our first meal and first drinks all five of us together
yeah
but also having access to food whenever I want
yeah
and having free washing
yeah
just little things that you don't really think are important but I'm really looking forward to
yeah
I'll tell you what I'm not looking forward to the trek into uni but like I'm quite lucky cos my timetable has been set as I'm in for full days not just an hour here and there so like
that's good lucky do you have any days off?
yeah two I think or one I think it's one but it depends on cos you don't get your seminars until like yo till your first weeks
till you literally start
so my seminars might be on awkward days but if they are then I'm just going to swap them cos I'm not paying bus fare to get in and out when I don't need to when I could be studying at home
yeah

because they say your degree is full time and you need to do all this studying but like if you're in unive I mean we don't get a lot of teaching hours for each module don't get me wrong but like you're in for like three or four days where the fuck are you supposed to find the time to do all the reading all the other work?
do all the reading I'm going to set myself what I used to do back when I was boarding I used to set myself an hour per night and even if I didn't have any homework I would just read over my lessons
yeah
so like an hour per night sometimes it would be more but I'm going to do that this year now
did I did I tell you that they've introduced recording of lectures?
yeah you mentioned that the other day that's brilliant

yeah erm you're not allowed to record in lectures now any more without permis without prior written permission but that were the same before anyway I just used to record like anyway no one knows erm but apparently like not all lectures are doing it lecturers are doing it it's not a requirement but it's like to help your learning but I don't think that my lecturers won't do it I know they won't because they'd get pissed off when peop cos then people won't turn up and they'll get pissed off and they'll just stop doing it
yeah
because last year on a Wednesday morning at ten o'cl like the first lecture at ten o'clock and it was the only lecture I had all day so I never used to go to it cos it were fucking shit anyway
yeah

and erm no actually I did used to go to it I used to go to it every single Wednesday and every single Wednesday she would send an email email out after the lecture saying the lecture hall was empty there was about ten people there and I'm just like well don't fucking hold it on a Wednesday morning then the day after like student night I know like that's daft but the fact of the matter is like students are there to learn yeah but they're still going to go out and get pissed every night
yeah
like or pissed on certain student nights
especially first years

so why would you hold it at ten o'clock on a Wednesday morning like why would you do that? it's just ridiculous but everevery single day throughout the whole year she sent an email out saying the lecture attendance was scarce I'm going to start doing registers blah blah blah she never did never once did a register
mm
I was like if you're going to threaten it do it because then people will be scared
yeah that would get them in

then that would get them in but like don't just threaten it all year and never do it because people will just think like well you said you were going to do it and you never did it so I'm just going to ignore you next time

yeah I need to check my time it's on my list of things to do today going to actually check it because it didn't seem like anything was clashing but there were no seminars written down it was just lectures
yeah
but there was like
but you can email to get them changed them seminars

loads of loads of different options for each thing so like it was literally the whole thing was full but when I actually looked at it closer it was like there is actually a lecture slot here but the same one like the same lecture but at a different time
yeah
so like I don't think that when I looked it was quite early on so I don't think they'd even sorted it out yet
yeah no sem yeah your seminars are like the week before you even start

I'll have a look at it now to see my lectures and stuff because then I can start thinking about when I want my seminars to be cos obviously I want to have a lecture first before a seminar because well there's no point in having a seminar the beginning of the week
you had that last year didn't you?
yeah it was just like there was nothing for us to do in that seminar
do you not discuss the last week's stuff?

well that's what we started doing because the woman was like this is actually pointless because we're going to be discussing things you haven't even seen in your lecture yet in which case it doesn't really work
yeah
so instead what she did is for one week she held off the seminars let us catch up a week of lectures and then what we did is on the Monday we would discuss the lecture from last Thursday
yeah
and stuff like that
one of my lectures lecture one is on a Thursday and lecture two is on a Tuesday how the fuck did they work that out?
what do you mean?
so do you know I have for some of my modules I have two lectures per week
yeah
so lecture one is on a Thursday but then lecture two is on a Tuesday how the fuck did they work that out? unless we start our first day is on a Thursday and that's why it's lecture one lecture two
it's not it's Monday
well I don't know why they've done that then it's ridiculous
it's weird maybe it will pan itself out

oh yeah I've had a I'm really pissed off cos I can't drop literature and just do full language there's no spaces available apparently and erm so I can go to language and linguistics but I don't want to do linguistics I'm going to have to catch up a whole year of fucking shit to do linguistics
yeah
so it's just like well I don't want to do that
maybe literature will be a bit more interesting for you this year though

yeah hopefully because I don't want it to affect my degree because I'm not very good at it like that exam mark forty-two percent that were disgusting like all my essays I got sixty-five sixty-seven percent
mm
so how can they justify giving me forty-two percent in an exam
yeah it's not very
like how does that work out
it's not very fair on you
it's like I get sixty-five percent all year sixty-seven percent and then in my exam I get forty-two percent
I can't wait to go get my feedback though cos obviously I wasn't there so I don't know what went along with my grades
yeah
I don't know why it was like that or I guess I'm just anxious to find it so that I know not to do the same mistakes next time
yeah
which is why I think it's silly like when said that they don't get feedback I was like how is that going to help you learn
yeah
if you don't know what it is specifically that you're doing wrong you'll keep doing it
yeah
cos you don't realise you're doing it wrong and that's such a bad way of learning
yeah it is a terrible cos you're just going to keep making the same mistakes until someone points them out

well yeah like people don't learn unless they know it's mistakes and like that's what you're there for you're there to learn how to do it right so like obviously you're going to have bad feedback but that's the point
even if it is bad it's constructive like cos you can work on it you can make them skills better
exactly what's the point of you turning up and being perfect there's no point going to university if you're perfect
no there isn't you're obsessed absolutely obsessed she looks like she's going to kill you
